channel.title: Post your scam story!
channel.description: I am positive each and every person here has had that one time where they were scammed miserably and felt like a noob. Well, here's the place to tell that story! Be it you or your friend, tell us about that time when you lost your items, account, or something else in RuneScape. Alternatively, you can post the time when you scammed someone else.

item.title: Post your scam story!
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:9, topic:497887”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=616120.msg4243080#msg4243080 date=1361937927]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=616120.msg4242924#msg4242924 date=1361930109]

[quote author=Flame_ link=topic=616120.msg4242902#msg4242902 date=1361926266]
I am positive each and every person here has had that one time where they were scammed miserably and felt like a noob.
[/quote]“One” time… Ahahaha… If only… Where do I start?
2. I finally worked up enough money to buy a dragon med helm (900K back in the day) and upon doing so, I was fooled by the old two-person scam where one stands saying they’re selling something for a high amount of money and another says they’re buying it. Bad times.
[/quote]Was it the bamboo reed? I got scammed and lost my dragon med the exact same way
[/quote]Something similar. It was a thatch spar light, which is some tribal item you get in Karamja.[/quote]

I got scammed the exact same way, Let me tell you how lololol

Me and my bro were in world 2 fally park one day and we were supposed to be the scammers… So there for a few hours we were in beast mode. And i finally got that dleg scam, this was back when they were around like 2.5 or 3m, somewhere around that area. So you all know i was excited, Sold the dlegs got the money blah blah blah so on, Then these 2 stinky twats show up, and one was standing like 10blocks from the other, And all i seen was “Selling meat tenderizer 3m” “Buying Meat Tenderizer 5m” So you damn right i went to trade the guy. I bought it he logged, and i went to trade the other guy and he logged. Come to find out this damn thing was only like 40k. So i pmed my bro and said Screw you and logged off. Its funny now that i think of it, Still blame him to this day lolol.

Read full topic

Fridder:

I lost 4 santa hats total. They’re all very long and boring stories. The end of the story is around 3:00am for all of them.

That sucks if your not lieng lol

item.title: Post your scam story!
item.dc:creator: @noah1gamble noah1gamble
item.description:
@noah1gamble wrote:

Scammed once for Full bandos and a sgs, by some guy who said to loet him tele me a few times to fally, as a test, after trading him each time and him teleing me or his friend or whatever, He teled me to Ice Platau. Lost over 40m, got it back the next day After all night of grinding for cash

Read full topic

Once a person came up to me and said that he could change my whip colour, I absent mindedly handed him my whip.
GF me

item.title: Post your scam story!
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:34, topic:497887”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=616120.msg4262970#msg4262970 date=1363633828]

Was in a house party fighting some guy, he got me to low hp and kicked everyone out. He then gave me a raw karambwan to cook and eat, and since I didn’t complete the quest to cook them it poisoned and killed me. Lost my first whip
[/quote]Is that patched now?

Yea expelling from a house will now give you full hp and cure poison. It was patched around July 2007.[/quote]
There’s still a scam that includes expelling people from your house though. If you can persuade a person to place an item on your table, you can then kick them out and you will be able to collect said item.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your scam story!
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

I’ve been scammed from over 20m during 07-10 but then i was a mopard then. During 2012 I was so fed up of scammers, I wasted my 3m cash stack on hosting legit bidding games for people to enjoy, I didn’t take any money, until the winner put up their offer, and it would all be done in 1 trade, legitly. Things like this is what Me and my friends wanted to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your scam story!
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I remember when i first started playing runescape, i was running around near lummy when someone opened a trade with me and gave me a whole bunch of free junk. I thought i was rich, and was extremely happy. Later that day all i remember is for some reason trading it to some guy, and not getting anything in return. It sucked… Think it was a ‘i’ll give this item to the highest bidder’ scam which i fell for… so sad.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your scam story!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

This was when i was 9…

I had full Guthans and Veracs… I was showing it off and some guy came up to me and said, “Hey! Come to Green Dragons, You’d own and make sh*t loads of cash.” Stupid me went along thinking “Wow, I’m going to be filthy rich.” So i went along with the guy. And there i was. Dead.

Funny part is that… IT WAS MY COUSINS ACCOUNT I got yelled at Like A Bo$$.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your scam story!
item.dc:creator: @Decimus Decimus
item.description:
@Decimus wrote:

A few years back I had around 50M and I had bought claws and mahog planks to get 99 mage off of. This guy then comes into Varry west bank saying to me that hes quitting and dropping his stuff (phat) in the pub by the sawmill. I went along with it because I was stupid and thought “Hey free money!” It then ends up with me not banking my planks or runes for some dumbass reason and me ending up in the beginning part of the wildy frozen by a ice barrage spell followed by a double claw spec. Lucky me I had lent out my claws for that day and had ~15M to return to.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your scam story!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I was active in account sharing for awhile, mostly just with my close friends.

  1. Friend fell for the guthan spear & leaf-bladed spear trick
  2. Same friend bought a guthan platebody for way more than its value
  3. My mistake was I let someone else on to fletch for me, lost some torag and other stuff.

No one except me has touched my account since.

Read full topic
